attributes.action: Insist Nuts, Zoo and FHM give Calley westwood a photoshoot
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Calley is one of the most beautiful models in the UK at the moment. She, along with the rest of the red-blooded male population, deserves a 10-pae spread.

Let's make it happen!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
